typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as integer,
		CRM_GP as string,
		MERCADO_GP as string,
		CATEGORIA_GP as string,
		JORNADA_GP as string,
		QUADRANTE_GP as string,
		ROW_ID_TERRITORIO_GP as short,
		ROW_ID_CONTATO_GP as string,
		CICLO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DimQuandranteMedicoGpSource
DimQuandranteMedicoGpSource select(mapColumn(
		contador = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelecionarId
SelecionarId aggregate(contador = max(contador)) ~> ValorMaxId
ValorMaxId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'contador',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ArmazenarCont
